mapper.select: select doctorId as "id", gender as "gender", doctor_department as "department", name as "name", doctor_title as "title", working_time as "workTime", state as "state" from doctor where 1=1 and if(#{id} is null,0=0,doctorId=#{id}) and if(#{name} is null,0=0,name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) and if(#{title} is null,0=0,doctor_title=#{title}) and if(#{department} is null,0=0,doctor_department=#{department}) and if(#{startTime} is null,0=0,working_time >= #{startTime}) and if(#{endTime} is null,0=0,working_time <= #{endTime}) and if(#{state} is null,0=0,state = #{state}) order by doctorId,working_time
mapper.update: update doctor set state = 1 where doctorId = #{id}
update doctor set gender = #{gender}, doctor_department = #{department}, name = #{name}, doctor_title = #{title} where doctorId = #{id}
